IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_character_points') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_character_points GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_character_points @character_id dbo.id_t, @hp SMALLINT, @mp SMALLINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET hp = @hp, mp = @mp WHERE id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
